TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XPathMessageQueryCollection extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageQueryCollection

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需訊息查詢的詳細資訊，請參閱 和 類別。For more information about message queries, see the and classes. ## Examples 下列範例會建立訊息和 XPath 訊息查詢。The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. 查詢會由包含在 物件內的 物件評估。The queries are evaluated by the objects contained in an object. 每一個查詢的結果都會使用 類別的 屬性測試。The results of each query are tested using the property of the class.
